properties.entry: INSERT /* com.greedy.semi.trainer.dao.ClassDAO#insertThumbnailContent() */ INTO TBL_CLASS A ( A.CLASS_NO , A.CLASS_NAME , A.CLASS_TYPE , A.CLASS_CATEGORY , A.CLASS_INTRO , A.CLASS_INTRODUCE , A.CREATED_DATE , A.TRAINER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_CLASS_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )

INSERT /* com.greedy.semi.trainer.dao.ClassDAO#insertAttachment() */ INTO TBL_ATTACHMENT A ( A.ATTACHMENT_NO , A.REF_CLASS_NO , A.ORIGINAL_NAME , A.SAVED_NAME , A.SAVE_PATH , A.FILE_TYPE , A.THUMBNAIL_PATH ) VALUES ( SEQ_ATTACHMENT_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )

SELECT /* com.greedy.semi.trainer.dao.ClassDAO#selectThumbnailList() */ A.CLASS_NAME , A.CREATED_DATE , B.ATTACHMENT_NO , B.ORIGINAL_NAME , B.SAVED_NAME , B.SAVE_PATH , B.THUMBNAIL_PATH FROM TBL_CLASS A JOIN TBL_ATTACHMENT B ON (A.CLASS_NO = B.REF_CLASS_NO) WHERE A.CLASS_STATUS = 'N' AND B.ATTACHMENT_STATUS = 'Y' AND B.FILE_TYPE = 'CLASSNAME' ORDER BY A.CLASS_NO DESC
